item.title: Aws VPC之间或VPC与私有网络之间的连接方式汇总
item.description: VPC之间的连接方式 专线 VPN托管服务 VPN Peering 自建或第三方VPN PrivateLink VPC与私有网络之间的连接方式 VPN托管服务 专线 专线+VPN 自建或第三方VPN Transit VPC VPN Hub

item.title: Aws VPC 基础
item.description: public subnet A public subnet is a subnet that’s associated with a route table that has a route to an Internet gateway if your subnet is not associated to a specific route table, then by default it’s going to the main route table Internet Gateway An Internet Gateway is a logical connection between an Amazon VPC and the Internet. It is nota physical device. Only one can be associated with each VPC.
